channel.title: Editing shops 718 ... help please
channel.description:
I downloaded the Npcunpackeddrops.txt . Moved to right folder,
Now how do i make it to where it actually edits the drop. I added a npc (revenant dragon) And was going to add pvp armour to it. I have packedDrops.d and i have a unpackednpcdrops.txt how does this work to where i can edit drops and change/add/remove drops ect. (noob)(new to coding an dstill learning) Please help ^.^
